name: Car Restoration 3D
description:
Breathe new life into old cars

Cars aren't built to last forever, and restoration can make them look and run like new. Buy a rusty wreck, transform it into a nice vehicle and sell it for a better price! You will be working on collectibles sooner than you think. Clean the body of the car, change tires, do plenty of bodywork and have fun using tools like polishers, spray cans and torque wrenches!

Features:
• Smooth gameplay
• Amazing graphics
• Realistic physics
• Plenty of cars!
publishers: Rollic Games Oyun Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
